root.message: The SDG_RELATED_INDICATORS field for indicator 1-3-1b, translated into en
root.data:
1.a.1 Proportion of resources allocated by the government directly to poverty reduction programs

1.a.2. Proportion of total government spending on essential services (education, health and social protection)

1.b.1. Proportion of government recurrent and capital spending in sectors that disproportionatly benefit women, the poor and vulnerable groups.
